text: Tel al-Hawa neighborhood () is a neighborhood located in South West Gaza City. During the Gaza massacre (December 2008), the neighborhood was subjected to massive destruction after intense bombing by the occupation army, and a large number of Palestinian citizens were arrested. As of 16 January 2009, 23 bodies were recovered from the rubble of bombed houses.دمار هائل بتل الهوا وغزة تشيع الشهيد سعيد صيام، قناة الجزيرة، 16 يناير 2009، تاريخ الولوج 16 يناير 2009 == References == Category:Geography of the Gaza Strip Category:Neighborhoods
title: Tel al-Hawa neighbourhood
